channel.title: SevenAtSevenLastSection
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenLastSection, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Create a Delicious Romance
item.description: "I spoke with the comic's creator, Peglo, for his thoughts on how to create a compelling romance — and why romance compels so many readers."

item.description: As Maryland’s secretary of juvenile services, Vincent Schiraldi exposed a history of torture, neglect and Black boys buried in unmarked graves.
